name: flower (itch) (cryocannon)
description:
NieR:Automata YoRHa UI created by https://lgk.io. Used with permission.

--

i finished my first playthrough of nier:automata yesterday. this is an interactive poem about everything that's been bouncing around my head since then.

featuring...

  • flowers for m[A]chines!
  • the quarantine!
  • robot death cults!
  • and st. therese de lisieux!

anyways play nier. it's very good
